name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution via Regsvr32
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed a malicious script using Regsvr32, leading to unauthorized access and data exfiltration. The playbook includes steps to terminate malicious processes, block network connections, and scan for additional threats.

action--33a8851a-5a38-4d9f-9c57-91b97f8a.name: Kill malicious script process
action--33a8851a-5a38-4d9f-9c57-91b97f8a.description: Terminate any processes running the malicious script to prevent further execution.

action--7fcaf5e3-4c9d-45f1-9189-4eb3ad40.name: Block outbound connections
action--7fcaf5e3-4c9d-45f1-9189-4eb3ad40.description: Block any outbound network connections that may have been established by the malicious script.

loop--a2525d47-f4e5-4770-b8ea-e2e004e299.name: Scan for additional threats
loop--a2525d47-f4e5-4770-b8ea-e2e004e299.description: Run a scan for additional threats on the host, continue until a clean state is confirmed.

action--a2525d47-f4e5-4770-b8ea-e2e004e2.name: Run system scan
action--a2525d47-f4e5-4770-b8ea-e2e004e2.description: Scan the system for additional malicious software and vulnerabilities.
